checklistDescription: TODO Items for an engineering facilitator of a new hire.

intro.description: Have an introductory check in with them

addToDevList.description: Add new hire to 18F developers list. Also look through recent emails to see if there are any updates they need.

devIntro.description: Intro them to the #dev team via Slack

groupIntro.description: Intro them to their small engineering group via Slack

facilitatorInvite.description: Invite them to the facilitator group meeting

setGoals.description: Set a meeting to create goals and OKRs

skillsSpreadsheet.description: Send them the staff skills spreadsheet and ask them to fill it out

performancePlan.description: Set up a 30-minute Performance Plan meeting with the new hire and the Director of Engineering. Copy the template card in Trello to keep track.

findMentor.description: Give them a clear mentor on their project work

findSpecialtyMentor.description: Give them a clear mentor on their specialty, likely outside of project

fastDeploy.description: Make sure the project mentor helps them deploy a change in the first two days of being on that project

teamTalk.description: Send link to the engineering team talk signup and invite them to put a talk down
